title: Lunchbox Tipped LESS For Son’s Haircut?! + Name That Fiddle Game! + Bobby Lets Scuba Steve Choose A Show Segment!
itunes:title: Lunchbox Tipped LESS For Son’s Haircut?! + Name That Fiddle Game! + Bobby Lets Scuba Steve Choose A Show Segment!
description:
Lunchbox’s son just got his very first haircut, but what happened at the barbershop left the tip amount in question! Bobby plays the fiddle part to a famous country song and the crew has to try and name the song! Plus, Bobby lets our Executive Producer "Scuba Scuba" cash in on his recent 'Bobby Bones Show Employee of the Month' Award by doing any segment he chooses!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
